title: Mourning Dawn
text: The Mourning Dawn is a loose network of [[Cyran|Cyre]] vigilantes and terrorists that operates across [[Khorvaire]], dedicated to making everyone on a long roll of [[Cyre]]â€™s enemies pay. The Dawn places House [[Cannith]] at or near the top of its list, since it holds them personally responsible for the [[Mourning]], despite insubstantial evidence.
